name: CalculateIt
description:
Quick Calculate the answer, is the only rule of the name.Does it simple? But it is not easy to play well. Can you calculate it ,Challenge With Quick Calculate, how well you can play ?

According to studies, rapid calculations are of great help to the activity of the brain.Performing a quick calculation every day for a certain period of time helps to activate the cerebral cortex, which has the function of developing intelligence and delaying the degeneration of the brain.

Quick calculations are also suitable for children who have just studied math to perform exercises.

At the same time, quick calculations also help young people improve their attention and exercise cortical activity.

【Feature】
* Minimalist , simple and easy to play, suitable for all ages, everybody may be quick master!
* heartbeat calculation ability competition, how fast does your age difference from your real age?
* Global ranking system, how many people can you overcome with your fast calculation ability?
* A variety of game modes to adapt to your different fast pace, casual and competitive coexist
* Smooth game experience

【GamePlay】
Calculate the answer quickly when you see the problem, and enter the answer. The rules are very simple
